headline: IFF Tackles Top Challenges in Baking at IBIE 2025
summary: NEW YORK, September 02, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF), a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients, health and biosciences, will showcase how it is helping the global baking industry overcome some of its toughest challenges at the International Baking Industry Exposition (IBIE) 2025 in Las Vegas. From soaring cocoa and egg prices to stricter regulations and rising demand for healthier baked goods, IFF is stepping forward with bold, science-led solutions designed to keep industrial bakers ah

headline: What International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF)'s Director Share Purchase and Analyst Support Means for Shareholders
summary: In the past week, International Flavors & Fragrances received continued positive analyst coverage and saw a significant insider share purchase by Director Paul Fribourg. These developments point to increasing confidence from both the analyst community and company leadership in the firm's prospects. Insider buying, particularly from a director, may signal to investors a belief in the company's long-term value and internal optimism about future performance. We'll explore how the recent insider...

headline: Jungbunzlauer to acquire from International Flavors & Fragrances, Inc. multipurpose site in Thomson, IL
summary: Jungbunzlauer, a global leader in high-quality, sustainable ingredients from natural sources, announced today the signing of a binding and definitive agreement to acquire the multipurpose production site in Thomson, IL from International Flavors & Fragrances, Inc. (IFF).
